div.p: We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. We consider applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, creed, religion, gender, national origin, age, marital status, the presence of a non-job related medication condition for handicap, and any other legally protected status. It is our policy to abide by all Federal, State, and local laws concerning discrimination in employment. No question in this application is intended to elicit information in violation of any such law nor will any information obtained in response to any question be used in violation of any such law.

Craig County Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Craig County Public Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
